title: Looking for Community Content Team members for Summoners' Society Community group

embed.description: Summoners' Society is looking to expand our content team to help with new projects that we have planned for 2019. We are looking for video creators, writers, graphic designers, artists, cosplayers and other creative people. If you are interested in creating League of Legends content, we want you as part of our team!

body:
Hello Summoners, 

Summoners' Society is looking to expand our content team to help with new projects that we have planned for 2019. 

We are looking for video creators, writers, graphic designers, artists, cosplayers and other creative people. If you are interested in creating League of Legends content, we want you as part of our team! 

As a member of our team, you will assist in both collaborative and/or individual projects for Summoners' Society. Works created for specific events and at the request of the admin team will belong to the organisation. However, we also encourage you to create your own individual content that can be promoted across our social media platforms and these personal projects will belong solely to you. We want you to feel comfortable in what you produce and to have a say in how your content is used! 

As we grow our content team, we hope to provide an avenue for creative community members to express themselves and gain experience that will help further their careers. This role is perfect for those who want to work on a content creation team, are open to challenges, interested in learning new skills, love League of Legends, and want to give back to the community. 

Though the content team role is voluntary at the moment, we are looking to push the group in a direction where it is sustainable so we can generate a source of income for the creative members of the community.  There are some in-game rewards given for time spent working.

The group meets 2-3 times a week:

Sunday: 8:00pm (For about 30 mins)
This is a general meeting for the whole of Summoners' Society team. 

Sunday: 8:30pm (For about 30 mins)
This is our content team meeting. This is where we talk about what we are doing together as a team and any updates for future projects.

Weekly Check-Ups
We check-in with our admins occasionally.  This is a 30min personal chat with your Team Leader.

Please consider the following when applying to work with us:
--Desired Skills--
- Teamwork
- Time management
- Communication
- Flexibility
- Work ethic
- Enthusiasm 
- Problem solving
- Responsibility
- Able to work under pressure
- Conflict resolution
- Self-motivated

--Experience Desired-- (will vary per applied role): 
- Experience with art mediums either digital software such as Photoshop, Clip Studio, etc; or other traditional styles are fine (watercolour, sketching, etc.)  Previous commission work is a plus. 
- Experience as a video editor. (Able to use video editing software, understand how to create video content.)
- Experience as a cosplayer (able to create costumes rather than buy them, experience with photo-shoots, league costumes, weapon and accessory design and production, etc.) 
- Experience as a graphic designer (able to use programs like Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, etc.)

--Role Benefits--
- Promotion of individual art/content.
- Experience working on a team in a creative environment.
- Learning opportunities for the team (such as streaming, art skills, networking, etc).
- Chance to share your input for future content ideas.
- Potential for compensation in the future.

If you feel this role is for you, please fill out the application below.

All participants will be emailed no matter the outcome of the application.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}} We look forward to hearing from you!
